level.text: A majority of the Commissioners in office shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business at all meetings of the Commission. A meeting may commence for the consideration of matters not requiring a vote when a majority of Commissioners in office are present.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 34 DCR 6707, 6711 (October 23, 1987); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1578 (February 16, 2007).
